text: Gurgen Ambartsumovich Egiazaryan (29 September 1948 - 28 October 2020) was an Armenian politician and writer. He was born in Yerevan. From 1999 to 2003, he was a member of the Armenian Parliament. In his later years he wrote three books, The Children of the Sun (2011), The Thief (2016) and The Wolf Knot Operation (2016). Egiazaryan died on 28 October 2020, aged 72, of COVID-19, during the pandemic in Armenia.От коронавируса скончался экс-заместитель главы СНБ Армении ==References== Category:Armenian politicians Category:Armenian writers Category:1948 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Armenia Category:21st-century Armenian people Category:20th-century Armenian people
title: Gurgen Egiazaryan
